entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 02:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -19.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -22.0°C
Wind: E 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard changing to periods of snow in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
